resources.title: ChatGPT

resources.title: Gemini
resources.description: Gemini AI is Google's powerful multimodal artificial intelligence model capable of understanding text, images, videos, and audio, enabling it to complete complex tasks and generate high-quality code in multiple programming languages.

resources.title: Microsoft Copilot
resources.description: Microsoft Copilot is a chatbot developed by Microsoft. Based on a large language model, it is able to cite sources, create poems, and write songs.

resources.title: Perplexity AI
resources.description: Perplexity AI is a conversational search engine marketed as an 'answer engine' that provides answers using natural language predictive text. It was launched in 2022 and offers real-time web searches and the most current information on various subjects.

It is part of the Adobe Family and allows creatives to share their projects, get feedback, watch livestreams, and connect with other members.

resources.title: Dribbble
resources.description: Dribbble is a leading online platform that serves as a community for creatives to share their design work, grow their skills, and find job opportunities. It is a hub for designers, illustrators, artists, and other creative professionals to showcase their portfolios and connect with like-minded individuals.
